com.google.publicalerts.cap
Class CapException.Reason

java.lang.Object
  com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapException.Reason
Enclosing class:
CapException
public static class CapException.Reason
extends Object

A reason for a CapException. This allows a single exception to contain multiple causes. This class is immutable and thread-safe.
